attributes.name: Sports Tracker
attributes.summary:
## Overview
Create a comprehensive Sports Tracker card for athletic performance monitoring and sports activity management in the Boxel framework. This card should help athletes and fitness enthusiasts track training, monitor performance metrics, analyze progress, and coordinate team activities across various sports and competitive levels.

## Core Fields

### Sport & Activity Information
- **sportType**: StringField - Basketball, soccer, tennis, running, cycling, swimming, etc.
- **activityLevel**: StringField with enum: "recreational", "competitive", "amateur", "semi-professional", "professional"
- **position**: StringField - Player position or specialty
- **team**: StringField - Team or club name
- **league**: StringField - Competition league or division
- **season**: StringField - Current season or training period
- **coach**: StringField - Coach or trainer name
- **primaryGoals**: containsMany(PerformanceGoal) - Training objectives

### Performance Metrics
- **personalBests**: containsMany(PersonalRecord) - Best achievements
- **currentStats**: contains(SeasonStats) - This season's performance
- **careerStats**: contains(CareerStats) - All-time statistics
- **skillRatings**: containsMany(SkillAssessment) - Ability evaluations
- **weaknessAreas**: containsMany(ImprovementArea) - Areas to develop
- **strengthAreas**: containsMany(Strength) - Strong skill areas
- **progressTrends**: containsMany(ProgressMetric) - Improvement tracking
- **benchmarks**: containsMany(Benchmark) - Performance standards

### Training & Workouts
- **trainingSchedule**: contains(TrainingPlan) - Weekly workout plan
- **workoutHistory**: containsMany(Workout) - Completed training sessions
- **upcomingWorkouts**: containsMany(ScheduledWorkout) - Planned sessions
- **trainingLoad**: NumberField - Current training intensity
- **recoveryMetrics**: contains(RecoveryData) - Rest and recovery tracking
- **injuryHistory**: containsMany(Injury) - Past injury records
- **rehabilitationPlan**: contains(RehabProgram) - Injury recovery plan
- **crossTraining**: containsMany(CrossTrainingActivity) - Supplementary activities

### Competition Tracking
- **competitions**: containsMany(Competition) - Upcoming events
- **competitionHistory**: containsMany(CompetitionResult) - Past results
- **rankings**: containsMany(Ranking) - Current standings
- **opponents**: containsMany(Opponent) - Competitor analysis
- **gameFilm**: containsMany(VideoAnalysis) - Performance video review
- **scoutingReports**: containsMany(ScoutingReport) - Opposition analysis
- **gameStrategy**: containsMany(TacticalPlan) - Competition preparation

### Health & Fitness
- **fitnessMetrics**: contains(FitnessAssessment) - Overall fitness level
- **anthropometrics**: contains(BodyMeasurements) - Height, weight, body composition
- **vitalSigns**: containsMany(VitalSign) - Heart rate, blood pressure
- **flexibilityTests**: containsMany(FlexibilityMeasurement) - Range of motion
- **strengthTests**: containsMany(StrengthTest) - Power and strength assessments
- **enduranceTests**: containsMany(EnduranceTest) - Cardiovascular fitness
- **nutritionPlan**: contains(SportNutrition) - Diet and supplementation
- **hydrationTracking**: containsMany(HydrationLog) - Fluid intake monitoring

### Equipment & Gear
- **equipment**: containsMany(SportsEquipment) - Gear and equipment inventory
- **equipmentMaintenance**: containsMany(MaintenanceRecord) - Care and upkeep
- **gearPreferences**: containsMany(GearPreference) - Preferred brands and models
- **uniformNumbers**: containsMany(UniformNumber) - Jersey numbers by team
- **equipmentBudget**: NumberField - Annual gear spending
- **sponsorships**: containsMany(Sponsorship) - Equipment sponsorship deals
- **replacementSchedule**: containsMany(ReplacementPlan) - Gear replacement timing

### Team & Social
- **teammates**: linksToMany(Teammate) - Team member connections
- **mentors**: linksToMany(Mentor) - Coaches and experienced players
- **trainingPartners**: linksToMany(TrainingPartner) - Workout partners
- **rivals**: linksToMany(Rival) - Competitive opponents
- **fanBase**: contains(FanEngagement) - Supporter interaction
- **socialMedia**: contains(SocialMediaPresence) - Online athletic presence
- **communityInvolvement**: containsMany(CommunityActivity) - Outreach activities

### Analytics & Technology
- **wearableDevices**: containsMany(WearableDevice) - GPS, heart rate monitors
- **videoAnalysis**: containsMany(PerformanceVideo) - Technique analysis
- **dataVisualization**: contains(PerformanceCharts) - Metric visualization
- **predictiveAnalytics**: contains(PerformancePrediction) - Future performance forecasts
- **biomechanicalAnalysis**: containsMany(BiomechanicsData) - Movement analysis
- **gameStatistics**: containsMany(GameStat) - In-game performance data
- **trainingApps**: containsMany(TrainingApp) - Connected fitness applications

## Required Component Cards

### Workout Card
Create a separate Workout card with:
- **workoutDate**: DateField - Training session date
- **duration**: NumberField - Session length in minutes
- **workoutType**: StringField - Strength, cardio, skill, recovery
- **intensity**: NumberField - Effort level 1-10
- **exercises**: containsMany(Exercise) - Specific activities
- **performanceMetrics**: containsMany(WorkoutMetric) - Session measurements
- **location**: StringField - Gym, field, home, etc.
- **weather**: StringField - Outdoor conditions if applicable
- **equipment**: containsMany(UsedEquipment) - Gear used
- **notes**: MarkdownField - Session observations
- **coach**: StringField - Supervising coach
- **injuryOccurred**: BooleanField - Any injuries during session

### Competition Card
- **competitionName**: StringField - Event or game name
- **competitionDate**: DateField - Event date
- **venue**: StringField - Location
- **opponent**: StringField - Opposing team or competitors
- **result**: StringField - Win, loss, draw, time, score
- **personalPerformance**: contains(PerformanceMetrics) - Individual stats
- **teamPerformance**: contains(TeamMetrics) - Team statistics
- **conditions**: StringField - Weather, court conditions
- **attendance**: NumberField - Spectator count
- **mediaAttention**: StringField - Press coverage level
- **postGameAnalysis**: MarkdownField - Performance review
- **lessonsLearned**: MarkdownField - Key takeaways

### PersonalRecord Card
- **recordType**: StringField - Best time, highest score, longest distance
- **recordValue**: NumberField - The actual record measurement
- **recordUnit**: StringField - Seconds, points, meters, etc.
- **achievementDate**: DateField - When record was set
- **competition**: StringField - Where record was achieved
- **conditions**: StringField - Environmental factors
- **witnesses**: containsMany(StringField) - People who verified
- **officialRecord**: BooleanField - Officially recognized
- **previousRecord**: NumberField - Previous best
- **improvement**: NumberField - Amount of improvement
- **videoEvidence**: contains(VideoLink) - Performance footage

## Computed Fields Logic

### Performance Trends
Calculate improvement rates across different time periods and metrics.

### Training Load Balance
Analyze training intensity vs. recovery time for optimal performance.

### Competition Success Rate
Win/loss percentage and performance consistency across competitions.

### Goal Achievement Progress
Track progress toward seasonal and career objectives.

## Card Layout Design

### Isolated/Embedded View Layout
Design an athletic performance interface:

**Header Section**
- Athlete photo and sport identification
- Current season stats summary
- Recent performance highlights
- Next competition countdown
- Training status indicator

**Performance Dashboard**
- **Key Metrics**:
  - Personal bests showcase
  - Recent performance trends
  - Season vs. career comparison
  - Goal achievement progress
  - Training load balance
  
- **Quick Actions**:
  - Log new workout
  - Record competition result
  - Update injury status
  - Schedule training session

**Training Center**
- Weekly training schedule
- Workout history timeline
- Recovery status monitoring
- Training load visualization
- Next session preparation

**Competition Tracker**
- Upcoming events calendar
- Recent competition results
- Opponent analysis
- Performance rankings
- Historical competition data

**Analytics Panel**
- Performance trend charts
- Comparative analysis
- Predictive modeling
- Strength/weakness assessment
- Biomechanical insights

### Mobile Athlete View
- Quick workout logging
- Real-time performance tracking
- Competition scheduling
- Team communication
- Emergency contact access

### Coach Management View
- Team roster overview
- Individual athlete progress
- Training plan management
- Performance comparison tools
- Communication hub

## Interactive Features

### Performance Analysis
- Trend visualization and forecasting
- Comparative benchmarking
- Goal setting and tracking
- Performance correlation analysis
- Weakness identification and improvement planning

### Training Optimization
- Smart training plan generation
- Recovery recommendation engine
- Injury prevention monitoring
- Load balancing algorithms
- Periodization planning

### Competition Preparation
- Opponent analysis and scouting
- Strategy development tools
- Performance simulation
- Mental preparation tracking
- Game plan creation

## Styling Requirements
- Sport-specific branding and themes
- Team colors and logo integration
- Athletic performance visualization
- Mobile-first responsive design
- High contrast for outdoor viewing
- Accessibility for various abilities
- Multi-language support for international sports
- Gender-inclusive design and terminology

## Validation Rules
- Performance metrics within realistic ranges
- Competition dates logical and future-oriented
- Training loads sustainable and safe
- Personal records improvements verified
- Equipment maintenance schedules reasonable
- Injury recovery timelines medically sound
- Goal timelines achievable and measurable
- Nutritional requirements appropriate for sport

## Integration Points
- **Wearable Devices**: Garmin, Fitbit, Apple Watch, Polar
- **Training Apps**: Strava, MyFitnessPal, TrainingPeaks
- **Video Analysis**: Hudl, Coach's Eye, OnForm
- **Team Management**: TeamSnap, SportsEngine, LeagueApps
- **Competition Platforms**: Athletic.net, SwimCloud, Golf Genius
- **Health Monitoring**: Apple Health, Google Fit
- **Social Platforms**: Instagram, TikTok for athlete branding
- **Nutrition Tracking**: Cronometer, MyPlate
- **Recovery Tools**: HRV4Training, Oura Ring
- **Equipment Retailers**: Dick's Sporting Goods, Amazon Sports

## Business Logic Requirements
- Intelligent performance trend analysis
- Automatic goal adjustment based on progress
- Injury risk assessment and prevention
- Training load optimization algorithms
- Competition scheduling and conflict resolution
- Performance benchmarking against peers
- Equipment replacement and maintenance scheduling
- Nutritional requirement calculation based on training load
- Recovery time estimation based on workout intensity
- Team coordination and communication features
- Sponsorship opportunity identification
- Career progression planning and guidance
- Mental health and stress monitoring
- Long-term athlete development tracking
